dt: {bc}a narrow trimming (as of lace or braid with metallic threads) having both edges scalloped

et: borrowed from French {it}galon{/it} "fabric edging used to decorate or reinforce apparel, curtains, etc.," going back to Middle French, derivative of {it}galonner{/it} "to decorate (the hair) with gold or silver threads," going back to Old French {it}galoner{/it}, of obscure origin
shortdef: a narrow trimming (as of lace or braid with metallic threads) having both edges scalloped
